text: John Ahern (December 4, 1934 â€“ December 19, 2020) was an American politician. He was a member of the Republican Party. Ahern was a member of the Washington House of Representatives, representing the 6th district from 2001 to 2009 and 2011 to 2013. Ahern was born in Havre, Montana. Ahern died on December 19, 2020 in Spokane, Washington at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Washington (state) Category:Politicians from Montana Category:People from Havre, Montana Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: John Ahern (politician)
